name: BAKE UHH!!
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May allah always bless you cake uhh! and aprm entha 1year epdi poochu ney theriyala and i missed you so much a lot and nee v2la maraikurathuku patura kasta puriyuthu bha in sha allah one day naa settle aanathuk aprm uniya thairiyama v2la sollura situation varum athu varaikum love u whole heartly athuku aprm um love you tha and nee nalla erukanum aprm en thoppai  aah nalla paathuko and enaiyum😅😅love youuu diii cuppy cake uhh🍰🧁💚🌍;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
